author: Sakshi Arora
title: Amarkantak: The Perfect Offbeat Religious Destination In Madhya Pradesh | Times Now
text: Surrounded by the towering Vindhya and Satpura ranges, Amarkantak, also called \"Teerthraj\" (the king of pilgrimages) is one of India’s most offbeat religious destinations. While this town in Anuppur district is famous because it is the origin city for one of India’s holiest rivers, Narmada, Amarkantak also holds great ecological significance and is a part of the a major biosphere reserve Achanakmar-Amarkantak.Along with Narmada, Amarkantak is also the origin of River Son, and Johila. Althoughthe precise origin location of River Son is actually in the Chhattisgarh village of Kodawahi butit is commonly believed that the river Son begins in Amarkantak and meets Arpa, which thenunites with Shivnath before merging again to become Mahanadi. What To See In AmarkantakThis hill town is also home to a large number of temples and shrines, many of which are protected by the Archaeological Survey of India in one compound. This complex houses several notable structures, including the Narmada Udgam Temple, where a kund is believed to be the source of the Narmada River, and the grand Karna Temple, the largest in the group. History buffs will be drawn to the Johila Temple, considered the oldest structure in the complex. You should also spend a day exploring the mysterious Yantra Temple whose construction started in 1991 but is still incomplete.Amarkantak isn't just about religious sites. Adventurers can explore the natural wonders of the region. Kapil Dhara, a waterfall named after the sage Kapil Muni who is believed to have meditated here, is the first waterfall of River Narmada, which plunges 24 metres here. There is another waterfall, called Dugdh Dhara for its frothy milk-like appearance, which can be visited by travellers seeking a more offbeat experience. Also Read: All About Gwalior Fort And 5 Other Sites On UNESCO's Tentative ListHow To Reach AmarkantakThe town is easily accessible by road. However, the nearest railway station, Pendra Railway station, is 40 kms from Amarkantak.

author: Sam Carter
title: Kentucky Wedding Show helping couples plan at The Henry Clay this weekend
text: Kentucky Wedding Show helping couples plan at The Henry Clay this weekend With so much to get organized, planning a wedding can be challenging. Dress shopping and chocolate fountains This Saturday, the Louisville Wedding Network looks to give engaged couples a leg up on planning when they hold the [Kentucky Wedding Show](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/kentucky-wedding-show-at-the-henry-clay-tickets-745743578117) at the Henry Clay. Don't forget the flowers The show features more than 60 local vendors with different wedding specialties. President of the Louisville Wedding Network Jamie Lott thinks keeping your planning local can relieve stress. Wedding cakes and the bar "If you hire me, you get me," Lott said. "If you hire a videographer, you get them, they are local vendors." Wedding planning with Jamie Lott Also a wedding planner, Lott tells WLKY that the average Louisville wedding costs between $30,000 and $40,000. That expense and expectation can put couples under stress; Lott gives the same advice to all her clients. "I always remind the couple that this process is amazing," Lott said. "But this wedding is about their marriage, their life together, not just about the wedding," Backdrops and music The Kentucky Wedding Show is either $10 at the door or free if you register in advance. It runs from 1-4:30 p.m.

author: David Santiago Muñoz Camargo"/>
title: Medallas de Colombia en los Juegos Paralímpicos París 2024 : Juegos Paralímpicos 2024: Así va Colombia en la tabla de medallería
text:
Colombia sigue haciendo historia en los Juegos Paralímpicos París 2024 . La delegación nacional llegó a 20 medallas y está cerca de superar el acumulado de 23 que se consiguieron en Tokio 2020 , aunque ya se hizo la mejor presentación en unas justas, pues en suelo asiático obtuvieron 3 medallas de oro y en Francia ya van 5 y con opciones de ganar más.
Los últimos en aportar oro al medallero colombiano fueron los hermanos Chica, Edilson y Leidy, quienes se impusieron en la final de la boccia ante Hong Kong por 6-1 en la categoría BC4 (destinada a deportistas con una capacidad de coordinación moderadamente afectada, un movimiento muy afectado en el tronco y las piernas con los brazos afectados o ausencia de extremidades”.
Además, hubo otras dos preseas de la mano de Karen Palomeque, en la prueba de salto de longitud T38 y Buinder Bermúdez en la final de los 400 metros T38. Ambos para atletas se colgaron la medalla de bronce.
Con estas medallas, Colombia llegó a 20 en total a tres días de terminar los Paralímpicos. Ocupa el puesto 19 en el medallero, con 5 de oro, 6 de plata y 7 de bronce, siendo además la segunda mejor delegación de Sudamérica, tras Brasil, que se ubica en el octavo puesto.
El líder del medallero es China con 73 oros, 55 platas y 37 bronces, para un total de 165. En el segundo lugar está Gran Bretaña , con 35 medallas de oro, 28 de plata y 19 de bronce, para el acumulado de 82. El tercer puesto lo ocupa Estados Unidos con 77 medallas en total, de las cuales 27 son de oro, 33 de plata y 17 de bronce.
Medallas de Colombia en París 2024 Deportista Medalla Prueba José Gregorio Lemos Oro y bronce Lanzamiento de jabalina F38 Erica María Castaño Oro Lanzamiento de disco F55 Karen Palomeque Oro 100 metros Jhon Obando Oro 400 metros Edilson Chica y Leidy Chica Oro Boccia mixto Nelson Crispín Plata (3) Para natación Mauricio Valencia Plata Lanzamiento de jabalina Carlos Daniel Serrano Plata y Bronce Natación Edison Chica Plata Boccia BC4 Leidy Chica Bronce Boccia BC4 Juan Alejandro Campas Bronce (2) 400 metros Faisury Jiménez Bronce 100 metros Karen Palomeque Bronce Salto de longitud T38 Buinder Bermúdez Bronce 400 metros T13 Diego Meneses Bronce Lanzamiento de jabalina Medallero de los Juegos Paralímpicos París 2024 Pos. País Oro Plata Bronce Total 1 China 73 55 37 165 Gran Bretaña 36 28 19 83 3 Estados Unidos 27 33 17 77 Países Bajos 21 10 5 36 5 Francia 17 22 22 61 19 Colombia 5 6 9 20

author: Enrico Tata
title: Perché la carbonara in barattolo non vi deve scandalizzare
text:
Enrico Tata
Nessuno tocchi la carbonara. La versione in barattolo presentata dal marchio Heinz, per il mercato inglese, è un sacrilegio per molti. Addirittura la ministra del Turismo, Daniela Santanché, ha deciso di dire la sua sulla vicenda: "La cucina italiana è una cosa seria. Come direbbe Alberto Sordi in un Americano a Roma: ‘La carbonara in lattina la damo al sorcio'".
Certo, la cucina italiana è una cosa seria. La carbonara è il simbolo della cucina romana e, ci scommettiamo, la versione in lattina della Heinz non conquisterebbe neanche un palato italiano. Tra gli ingredienti ci sono panna e pancetta al posto del guanciale e dell'uovo. Insomma, non deve essere una ricetta da leccarsi i baffi ed è certamente molto lontana da quella originale. Ma occorre fare due considerazioni: la carbonara in barattolo è destinata al mercato anglosassone e la Heinz tra i suoi prodotti in vendita propone già ‘spaghetti bolognese', ‘tomato sauce for Bolognese', pizza ai fagioli, la salsa per Lasagne e ‘ravioli', per cui nessuno si è strappato i capelli.
La cucina italiana è una cosa seria, certamente. La carbonara in barattolo è un insulto alla vera carbonara che si può gustare a Roma (non ovunque, purtroppo). Ma anche la cucina messicana è una cosa seria. Eppure non ci scandalizziamo dei barattoli di "chili con carne" che si trovano nei reparti delle cucine dal mondo presenti in tutti i supermercati. E nessuno ha qualcosa da dire sui noodles che magicamente diventano spaghetti in brodo. E non c'è voce che si levi contro le specialità indiane in barattolo che sono in bella vista sugli scaffali dei punti vendita.
E ancora, qualcuno si scandalizza dei risotti in busta? Non hanno abbastanza dignità da essere consumati? Certo, uno chef potrebbe obiettare che non hanno nulla a che vedere con un risotto preparato in un ristorante, per una serie di ragioni. Tutte giuste e sacrosante, ovviamente. Ma chi non ha mai preparato un risotto in busta alzi la mano.
E allora perché ci dovrebbe scandalizzare il fatto che, in un supermercato del Regno Unito, un noto marchio che già propone ‘spaghetti bolognese' decida di mettere in vendita anche un barattolo di ‘spaghetti carbonara'?
Tutt'altra questione, e questa è seria, è il fenomeno dell"Italian Sounding', cioè l'utilizzo di immagini e marchi che si rifanno all'Italia per commercializzare prodotti che in realtà non hanno niente a che fare con il nostro Paese. Di esempi ce ne sono tantissimi e il catalogo si arricchirà presto con la carbonara in barattolo. Basti pensare agli ‘Spaghetti Meatballs' della Campbell's, l'azienda famosa per i barattoli di zuppa di pomodoro resi famosi da Andy Warhol.
Non è una ricetta italiana, come non è italiana la ricetta della carbonara con panna e pancetta (che purtroppo propongono anche molti ristoranti italiani). Appurato questo, possiamo andare oltre.

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Injured Bavuma ruled out of Cape Town Test
text:
Summary by Ground News Zubayr Hamza will join the squad, while Dean Elgar will serve as captain. Bavuma suffered a strain to his left hamstring in the first session of the Boxing Day Test against India. He will have the injury assessed in two weeks' time to determine his availability. author: By
title: ONE IN A MILLION: Woman celebrates birthday by winning $1M scratch-off
text:
PALOS HEIGHTS, Ill. (Gray News) - Never in a million years did an Illinois woman think she would win an instant $1 million by playing a scratch-off.
An unidentified woman celebrated her birthday by winning a seven-figure lottery ticket. The ticket was purchased at a BP gas station at 12700 South Harlem Ave. in Palos Heights, according to WLS.
WLS reported that the woman decided to stop at a gas station and buy a $25 Diamond Crossword 10X purple ticket. She said she selected that specific ticket because it was her favorite color.
“When I scratched the ticket in my car, I kept seeing wins that were getting bigger and bigger,” she said, per the reports. “As I got to the end, I realized it was worth $1 million and I couldn’t believe it.”
The woman was so shocked she went back in to double-check.
“I instantly started crying and my legs felt like noodles. I didn’t think I would be able to drive home,” she said.
The woman told lottery officials that the money will make a difference in her life. She said she and her husband work very hard and she wants to give her children opportunities that the world has to offer.
The store will receive $10,000 for selling the winning ticket.

author: @todonoticias
title: Julieta Poggio se sumó al hit fashionista del verano: la microbikini underboob XXS | TN
text:
Julieta Poggio , siempre a la vanguardia de las tendencias, volvió a marcar tendencia con su último look de playa en Instagram . La ex participante de Gran Hermano deslumbró a sus seguidores al lucir una microbikini underboob XXS , el diseño que se ha convertido en el hit indiscutido del verano. Con su estilo fresco y juvenil, Julieta reafirma su lugar como referente de moda, apostando por este audaz modelo que es furor entre las celebridades y fashionistas de todo el mundo.
¿Los detalles de la apuesta? Se trata de un traje de baño de dos piezas supercanchero formado por un corpiño rectangular underboob que deja parte de sus pechos a la vista y una bombacha colaless .
Leé también: Barby Silenzi, la novia de “El Polaco”, posó con una microbikini neón desde Punta Cana
La dupla es de base gris topo y cuenta con tiritas y breteles en total black . Además, la pieza superior tiene una inscripción estampada en verde neón .
Julieta Poggio en microbikini underboob. (Foto: Instagram/@poggiojulieta). Completó el estilismo de pileta con un par de lentes de sol XXL de formato geométrico con vidrio semitransparente y marco amarronado .
Julieta Poggio en microbikini amarilla de sirena Semanas atrás, desde el cerro de Potrerillos y con el lago de fondo, impactó con un modelo en color amarillo (uno de los protagonistas en trajes de baño para la temporada 2025), de corpiño armado con breteles finos y bombacha muy cavada con tiritas regulables en los laterales.
Julieta Poggio en bikini amarilla estilo sirena. (Foto: Instagram/@poggiojulieta) ¿El detalle diferencial? Cada una de las partes de la pieza superior tiene forma de caracol , y en el medio el bretel está adornado con una perla . Los looks inspirados en las sirenas fueron furor durante todo el año y, según las predicciones de tendencias de Pinterest para 2025, seguirán vigentes.
Seguinos en @estilotn y enterate de todo lo nuevo en moda y belleza.

author: Bangkok Post Public Company Limited
title: Cambodia, Laos restrict livestock imports
text: Cambodia and Laos have temporarily banned the import of livestock and related animal products from Thailand to prevent anthrax outbreaks.
